name: The Nigerian Economic Summit Group
headAddress: The Summit House. 6 Oba Elegushi Road, Off Oba Adeyinka Oyekan Avenue, Ikoyi
goal:
NESG is Nigeria's leading think-tank promoting sustainable growth and development in the Nigerian economy using research based advocacy methods in line with global best practice.

It is committed to fostering open and continuous dialogue on Nigeria’s economic development. It seeks to define and facilitate the implementation of an economic agenda that will help create an environment conducive to good governance, responsible private sector investment and sustainable private sector driven economic growth and development.

The NESG is a membership based organization whose membership is specially crafted for policy level executives from individually-owned businesses to large multinational corporations, that are aligned with the NESG’s commitment to national interest and our membership core values; Ethical business practices; Good governance; Attractive climate for private investment; Competitive and open market systems; Economic reforms proven to generate sustainable economic development, equitable income distribution and improved living standards; Open dialogue on critical economic issues and the free flow of ideas; as well as objective research.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
